Awards.Actors: Kevin Costner, Mary McDonnell, Graham Greene
Awards.Plot: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, finds himself engaging with a neighbouring Sioux settlement, causing him to question his own purpose.
